snippet.title: Edge of Memories | Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
An unknown affliction spreads across Avaris, the Corrosion mutates everything it encounters into terrible abominations. The continent’s nomadic people do their best to celebrate life in a world where they can only await death. 

Explore this world as Eline, a Soul Whisperer, traveling with her companions, Ysoris and Kanta. However, it’s the discovery of a new power within her that may hold the key to ending the oncoming apocalypse. 

Edge of Memories will be coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC in Fall 2025. 
-------------------------------
